article_title: ISU limits some work hours due to ACA

article_metadata.description: NORMAL — Because of the Affordable Care Act, Illinois State University is limiting the weekly work hours of certain employees to 28 hours.
article_metadata.author:
Lenore Sobota
lsobota@pantagraph.com
